item.title: Wing Anti-Ice VALVE Lights – Associated Valve Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated valve is inoperative.

note.para: No flight in known or forecast icing conditions.

numlitem.para: Operations in known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Wing Anti-ice Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
